statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT technician_name, maintenance_date FROM vehicle_maintenance ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, repair_log FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE vehicle_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE technician_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT maintenance_type, COUNT(*) AS maintenance_count FROM vehicle_maintenance GROUP BY maintenance_type ORDER BY maintenance_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, technician_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC, technician_name ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, SUBSTRING(technician_name, 1, 5) AS short_name, COUNT(*) AS total_repairs FROM vehicle_maintenance GROUP BY vehicle_id;
SELECT DISTINCT technician_name, repair_log FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE repair_log IS NOT NULL AND technician_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY technician_name;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedules ORDER BY vehicle_id ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_description FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE vehicle_id = 100;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type, maintenance_description FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE vehicle_id = 200 AND maintenance_type = 'Tire Rotation';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT repair_date, repair_description, repair_cost FROM RepairLogs WHERE repair_cost > 1000;
SELECT maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE vehicle_id = 101 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(*) AS num_repairs FROM RepairLogs GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY num_repairs DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedules JOIN RepairLogs ON MaintenanceSchedules.vehicle_id = RepairLogs.vehicle_id WHERE MaintenanceSchedules.vehicle_id = 201 ORDER BY maintenance_date, repair_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT * FROM RepairLog ORDER BY repair_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, repair_description FROM RepairLog WHERE vehicle_id = 100;
SELECT vehicle_type, manufacturer FROM Vehicle WHERE model = 'Civic';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
SELECT repair_description FROM RepairLog WHERE vehicle_id = 1 ORDER BY repair_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, manufacturer, model FROM Vehicle WHERE vehicle_type = 'Sedan';
SELECT DISTINCT manufacturer FROM Vehicle;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedules;
SELECT * FROM repair_logs WHERE repair_cost > 1000;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, year_of_manufacture FROM vehicles WHERE year_of_manufacture >= 2015;
SELECT personnel_name, role FROM maintenance_personnel WHERE role = 'Mechanic';
SELECT maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_schedules ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedules ORDER BY schedule_id DESC;
SELECT maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
SELECT personnel_name, role FROM maintenance_personnel WHERE role = 'Mechanic';
SELECT repair_log_id, repair_description, repair_cost FROM repair_logs WHERE repair_cost > 500;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, year_of_manufacture FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type IN ('Car', 'Truck');
SELECT * FROM Vehicle
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, manufacturer FROM Vehicle
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE schedule_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT description, repair_date FROM RepairLog ORDER BY repair_date DESC
SELECT task_name, estimated_duration, personnel_name FROM MaintenanceTask INNER JOIN MaintenancePersonnel ON MaintenanceTask.assigned_personnel = MaintenancePersonnel.personnel_id
SELECT * FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT vehicle_type, COUNT(*) FROM Vehicle GROUP BY vehicle_type;
SELECT manufacturer, year FROM Vehicle WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota' ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT v.*, r.repair_type, r.repair_date FROM Vehicle v JOIN RepairLog r ON v.vehicle_id = r.vehicle_id;
SELECT mt.task_name, mp.personnel_name FROM MaintenanceTask mt JOIN MaintenancePersonnel mp ON mt.assigned_personnel = mp.personnel_id;
